headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FALCONE, RICHARD A

lead_paragraph: FALCONE--Richard A. The partners, counsel, associates and staff of the firm of Paul, Weiss, Rifkind, Wharton & Garrison LLP express profound sorrow at the death of Richard A. Falcone, beloved father of our friend and partner, Marc Falcone. We express our deepest sympathies to Marc, Caitlin and to all other members of the family.
